meta.title: Inventing
meta.description: We revolutionize how software works. With AI, new possibilities have arisen—we deliver solutions at a fraction of what custom software previously cost. Pragmatic developers solving real challenges and reducing admin burden.

hero.title: Inventing
hero.taglineHighlight: at a fraction of what custom solutions previously cost

services.heading: What we do
services.description: Pragmatic developers with the latest tools, solving real challenges and reducing admin burden—not just building software, but solving problems fast

buildWebsite.title: Build a website
buildWebsite.description: Modern, responsive websites that solve real business challenges. Built with cutting-edge technology at a fraction of traditional costs.

customTransformation.title: Custom transformation
customTransformation.description: Transform your business processes with AI-powered solutions tailored to your needs. Solve real challenges, not just build software.

aiAutomation.title: AI-powered automation
aiAutomation.description: Intelligent automation that reduces admin burden and solves real problems. We leverage the latest AI tools to deliver solutions fast.

removingAdmin.title: Reducing admin burden
removingAdmin.description: Automate repetitive tasks and workflows intelligently. Focus on growth while we handle the admin—solving real challenges, not just building software.

valueProposition.quoteHighlight: at a fraction of the cost
valueProposition.supportingText: With AI opening new possibilities, we're pragmatic developers with the latest tools—always knowing how to solve real problems in a crazy fast way. We don't just build software, we solve real challenges and reduce admin burden.

contact.heading: Get in touch
contact.description: Ready to revolutionize your software? Let's solve your challenges together.
